title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park does not charge an entrance fee.  The Paterson Museum, a partner of the National Park Service, doesn't charge an admission fee, however has a suggested donation of $2 per adult. For more information contact the museum at (973) 321-1260 or visit their website.  We currently do not sell passes at our locations but we have respective parks around us that do sell these passes such as in Morristown NHP in Morristown, NJ and Thomas Edison NHP in West Orange.
